title: De Zuidkant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Macrobiotic, Organic, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: Opened summer 2014, a cozy 100% vegetarian restaurant with vegan options; try the vegan lasagna. All food is made with biological and local ingredients. Termed a living room restaurant. Biological beers are available. At noon, there's a take-away service (also possible at evening). Easy to reach by train (Gentbrugge station-3 min walk), tram (21, stop ankerslaan), bus (3,9,20: stop meersemdries).
